message:
SYSTEM: 4._methodologies-Espec-OL.pdf: Página 27
Ontological Engineering 
©Asunción Gómez-Pérez,
Ontology Specification. Group CQs
Objective: To classify the CQs into different groups or 
categories. 
Output: A classification of the set of CQs.
Recommended Techniques: 
 Card Sorting (manual).
 Clustering NL sentences (automatic).
 Information Extraction (automatic).
Recommended Tools: 
 If the card sorting technique is used, then MindMap
Tools or Cicero Tool (for distributed teams).
speaker: SYSTEM
